name: Space Step: Heroes of the Earth
summary:
Protect Earth from alien invaders and become the hero of the galaxy! 
 
Welcome to the Alliance! Orcs are already in orbit of the Moon, and in the far corners of the galaxy the long-forgotten enemy is preparing to attack. And it's all on your shoulders, soldier! The space is waiting! The destiny of the Earth is in your hands! 
 
The war in space has much to offer: 
- The story of the galactic war, which will make you cry and laugh! 
- Combat ships from the best engineers of the galaxy, which you can upgrade! 
- The battles that will temper you - become the best pilot in the Alliance! 
- Improve statistics and get awards personally from the commander! 
- Modern old school graphics, which will give the most pleasure and adrenaline from the battle! 
- All this for the best music, which is loved all over the Milky Way! 
 
The Earth is waiting for its heroes! The Earth is waiting for you! 
 
Welcome to the galactic war, soldier! 
 
FIGHT!!!
